verse: मन एव मनुष्याणां कारणं बन्धमोक्षयोः । बन्धाय विषयासक्तं मुक्त्यै निर्विषयं स्मृतम् ॥
meaning: Meaning:The mind is indeed the cause of bondage and liberation for human beings. When the mind is attached to desires and objects, it leads to bondage. But when the mind is detached from desires and objects, it leads to liberation. This teaching is remembered.
